INNER JOIN SGN_SIGN SS ON SS.DOCNO=SD.DOCNO AND SS.USERNO=${userno} AND SSTYPE!=0 AND SS.SSRESULT!=0 AND SS.SSRESULT=0 AND SS.SSSTEP=SD.DOCSTEP WHERE SD.DELETEFLAG='N' -- AND SD.DOCSTATUS IN (1,2)
${item} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%' )
mapper.select:
SELECT SD.DOCNO, DOCTITLE, SD.USERNO, USERNM, DOCSTEP, SD.DTNO, SDT.DTTITLE, DEPTNM , DATE_FORMAT(UPDATEDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') UPDATEDATE, CODENM DOCSTATUS FROM SGN_DOC SD INNER JOIN COM_USER CU ON SD.USERNO=CU.USERNO INNER JOIN SGN_DOCTYPE SDT ON SDT.DTNO=SD.DTNO INNER JOIN COM_CODE CC ON CC.CODECD=SD.DOCSTATUS AND CLASSNO='2'
ORDER BY DOCNO DESC
LIMIT ${rowStart-1}, 10

SELECT SD.DOCNO, DOCTITLE, SD.USERNO, USERNM, DOCSTEP, SD.DTNO, SDT.DTTITLE, DEPTNM , DATE_FORMAT(UPDATEDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') UPDATEDATE, CODENM DOCSTATUS FROM SGN_DOC SD INNER JOIN COM_USER CU ON SD.USERNO=CU.USERNO INNER JOIN SGN_DOCTYPE SDT ON SDT.DTNO=SD.DTNO INNER JOIN COM_CODE CC ON CC.CODECD=SD.DOCSTATUS AND CLASSNO='2'
ORDER BY DOCNO DESC
LIMIT ${rowStart-1}, 10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SGN_DOC(DOCTITLE, USERNO, DOCCONTENTS, DOCSTATUS, DOCSTEP, DTNO, DEPTNM, DOCSIGNPATH, UPDATEDATE, INSERTDATE, DELETEFLAG) VALUES (#{doctitle}, #{userno}, #{doccontents}, #{docstatus}, 1, #{dtno}, #{deptnm}, #{docsignpath}, NOW(), NOW(), 'N')
INSERT INTO SGN_SIGN(DOCNO, SSSTEP, SSTYPE, SSRESULT, RECEIVEDATE, USERNO, USERPOS) VALUES (#{docno}, #{ssstep}, #{sstype}, #{ssresult}, NOW(), #{userno}, #{userpos})
mapper.select: SELECT DOCNO, DOCTITLE, SD.USERNO, USERNM, DOCCONTENTS, DOCSTATUS, DOCSTEP, DTNO, DEPTNM , DATE_FORMAT(UPDATEDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') UPDATEDATE, DOCSIGNPATH FROM SGN_DOC SD INNER JOIN COM_USER CU ON SD.USERNO=CU.USERNO WHERE SD.DELETEFLAG='N' AND DOCNO=#{docno}
SELECT SS.USERNO FROM SGN_DOC SD INNER JOIN SGN_SIGN SS ON SS.DOCNO=SD.DOCNO AND SS.SSSTEP=SD.DOCSTEP WHERE SD.DOCNO=#{docno} AND SD.DOCSTATUS IN (1,2)
SELECT SSNO, DOCNO, SSSTEP, SSTYPE, SSRESULT, SD.USERNO, USERNM, SD.USERPOS, SIGNDATE, SSCOMMENT FROM SGN_SIGN SD INNER JOIN COM_USER CU ON SD.USERNO=CU.USERNO WHERE DOCNO=#{docno} ORDER BY SSSTEP

SELECT SSNO, DOCNO, SSSTEP, SSTYPE, 0 SSRESULT, SD.USERNO, USERNM, CD.CODENM USERPOS FROM SGN_SIGN SD INNER JOIN COM_USER CU ON SD.USERNO=CU.USERNO INNER JOIN COM_CODE CD ON CLASSNO='3' AND CD.CODECD=CU.USERPOS WHERE DOCNO=(SELECT DOCNO FROM SGN_DOC WHERE USERNO=#{userno} AND DTNO=#{dtno} ORDER BY DOCNO DESC LIMIT 1) ORDER BY SSSTEP
SELECT SSSTEP FROM SGN_SIGN SD WHERE DOCNO=#{docno} AND SSRESULT=0 LIMIT 1
